articles.author: Ryan McMorrow, Tina Hu
articles.title: Amazon set to take on Temu and Shein with new discount section - Financial Times
articles.description: Ecommerce giant seeks to mirror cut-price rivals’ business model of direct-from-China offerings
articles.content:
Amazon is planning to fight back against rising competition from rivals Temu and Shein, mirroring their business models with a new direct-from-China discount section.
In a recent meeting with top Ch… [+2644 chars]

articles.title: Crazy Town: Butterfly singer Shifty Shellshock dies, aged 49 - BBC.com
articles.description: The band were best known for the rap-rock single Butterfly, which was a top 10 hit in 2001.
articles.content:
By Mark Savage, Music Correspondent
The singer and rapper was best known for the hit single Butterfly
